description: If you want to stop sharing METRICLOG files (and other diagnostic files) with Apple, you can do so by disabling your iOS device's Share Analytics setting. This setting is located at:
From the Analytics & Improvements screen, you can also view your device's current METRICLOG files (and other diagnostic files), by selecting Analytics Data .
